content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day January 9, 2025 Email Archiving and Discovery for Legal and Privacy Requests January 9, 2025 Government agencies and organizations must handle a growing volume of legal and privacy-related requests such as FOIA. Many are using email archiving solutions to meet these needs but outdated technology can introduce significant bottlenecks and prevent them from responding quickly and accurately.
